sentence.Network_en: Hermione Granger : Harry, no way ! You heard what Madam Hooch said.

sentence.Network_en: Madam Hooch : Come back down this instant! Everyone out of the way!
sentence.Network_cn: 胡奇夫人: 立刻给我下来! 大家全都让开!

sentence.Network_en: Paul: They're got swell hooch here. They even wash the glasses.
sentence.Network_cn: 保罗: 他们卖酒, 连酒杯都洗得干干净净.

胡奇夫人(Hooch)：霍格华兹飞行课的老师、魁地奇球赛的裁判。有著灰色的头发，和一对老鹰似黄眼睛。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: abbreviation of Hoochinoo, the name of an Alaskan Indian people who made liquor
1950s (originally military slang): perhaps from Japanese uchi dwelling'

means.word_mean: 1. an illicitly distilled (and usually inferior) alcoholic liquor
